EmailTemplate.name: New SF Feature
EmailTemplate.subject: New Functionality released 05/16/2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly: There was a code update 05/16/2014 that will automatically update 2 date fields on the Opportunity: "Initial Webex Complete Date" and the "Last Completed Webex Date". When the first webex has the Webex Status field updated and both those date fields are empty. The system will populate both of those fields with the Start Date from the Webex Event. Any Webex event updated to completed after the initial webex will automatically update the "Last Completed Webex Date".
